CHAT.comment: In the living room, CHI and MIT are playing with a sticker book .
In front of a Disney calender

u.a: points at penguins in the picture
puts the ball in the ocean
touches the ball sticker in the book
takes the sticker sheet from MIT
points at the middle of the sheet
leaves the table for a minute and comes back
points at a dog in the picture
points at an archaeopteryx on the sticker sheet
puts the sticker on the bottom end of the page
puts it in the same spot
points at a sticker of a running woman
touches the leg of the running woman
puts the tiger sticker over a dinosaur
points at a dinosaur in the picture
puts the sticker on the picture
pulls our a pattern matching toy
take a car out of its frame
<bef> an electric appliance beeps in the kitchen
the patterns get stuck in the bag
pulls out an airplane of the bag
moves the airplane pattern in the air
holds up the airplane and the frame for it
moves the plane in the air
<$=3> pushes the train out of the frame
removes the train from the frame
hides all the patterns behind himself
runs around MIT trying to see what he has in his hands
takes the car and runs around MIT
tries to looks behind MIT's back
points at the airplane on the floor
gives CHI the rest of the patterns
takes our more patterns from MIT's bag
tries to push a ship out of its frame
pushes the sailboat out of its frame
gives MIT the frame for the sailboat
puts the sailboat on its frame
pushes the sailboat into the frame
the box is a flap that can be lifted
points at the flap on the next page
looking at the hiragana chart on the wall
approach the chart and points at a picture of tangerine oranges
climbs on the sofa in order to reach the chart
points at a picture of pencils
holds up CHI to the chart
touches the temperature control on the wall
takes CHI to the katakana chart
CHI falls off a box he was standing on
points at a picture of ham
looks for a giraffe on the charts
points at the camel on the hiragana chart
points at a picture of himself hanging on the wall/ &+quot;Kohei&+quot;
pointing at a daruma paper mache on the chart
points at a picture of himself and his parents
points at himself in the picture/ &+quot;Kohei&+quot;
takes a file folder on the chest of drawers
opens the folder on the bed
shows CHI a sheet that shows an elephant and the lyrics to zoo-san
moves some paper to the top of the drawers
pulls out paper that looks like application forms
pulls out an application form and gives it to MIT
points at the chest of drawers
moves some paper on the top of the drawers
hands MIT some of the forms
<aft> MOT and MIT talks about the application forms
balloons on the wall in different color
CHI put his mug on the drawer top
holds up CHI shita that he can touch the balloons
points at a sticker of Pluto on the oposite wall
points at Pluto in the calender
points at Pluto in the calender
points at the balloons in the calender
runs to another wall covered with Disney characters
CHI climbs on a box on which the tape recorder is placed
moves his pointing finger in circles above the tape recorder
opens the lid of the tape recorder holder
<$=2> presses down the clasp to lock the lid
fastens the curtain to a hook
<aft> the two play hid and seek with the curtain
draws a circle on the foggy window
takes MIT's pointing finger and makes him draw Ampamman
takes MIT's finger and draws Baikimman
